job.title: ServiceNow Developer
job.description: pstronguJOB DESCRIPTIONustrongppbrppstronguRequired US Citizen Onlyustrongppbrpp	Actively participate in agile daily scrums and ceremonies updating stories daily in SNOW documenting development progress and collaborating across platform teamspp	Support and participate in customer requirement workshops working with product ownerstakeholders to configure requested items and tasks using Flow Designer to manage processes and meet business requirementspp	Develop applications scoped and out of the box working with ServiceNow Studiopp	Design create and configure Notifications UI Pages UI Macros Script Includes Formatters etcpp	Design create and configure Business Rules UI Policies UI Actions Client Scripts and ACLs including advanced scripting of each including CMSService Portalpp	Support in the development of use cases and testing procedures ensuring product functionality debugging and testing is completed prior to production deploymentpp	Create and maintain system design and operations documentationpp	Build automated testing in ServiceNow ATFpp	Ensure all development is created in alignment with ServiceNow Technical Best PracticesppbrppstronguEducation and Requirements ustrongppbrpp	Minimum of Bachelors Degree or equivalency and 10 years experiencepp	Extensive understanding of the ways in which ServiceNow can be configured and customized and scripting within the toolpp	Experience integrating ServiceNow with external systems through SOAP or REST web servicespp	Experience with the ServiceNow Studio IDEpp	Experience using the Workflow Editor to configure workflowspp	Experience with HTML5 JAVA JavaScript jQuery CSS Angularjsp
